thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 4
thread.title_full: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 4 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to Aug 4
text:
July 21 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily ***
THURSDAY, JULY 23
JOHANNESBURG - South African Finance Minister Nhlanhla Nene opens SADC Financial Inclusion Indaba. The aim of the Indaba is to promote financial inclusion in the SADC region. The conference will bring together public and private stakeholders from countries in the SADC region - 0600 GMT. PRETORIA - South African Reserve Bank interest rate decision - 1300 GMT. ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey to hold monetary policy committee meeting to set interest rates. ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to July 24).
MONDAY, JULY 27
JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel interest rate decision - 1330 GMT. TUESDAY, JULY 28
BRASILIA - Central bank of Brazil holds monetary policy committee meeting (to July 29).
WEDNESDAY, JULY 29
BANGKOK - Thai finance ministry to update new economic forecasts - 0600 GMT. BRASILIA - Central bank of Brazil announces interest rate decision - 2200 GMT. THURSDAY, JULY 30
EGYPT - Central Bank of Egypt holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting - 0600 GMT. ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey to hold news conference to announce quarterly inflation report. MEXICO CITY - Central bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement. SANTIAGO - Central bank of Chile will publish the minutes of July interest rate meeting - 1130 GMT.
FRIDAY, JULY 31 MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 4
BUCHAREST - Central Bank of Romania holds interest rate meeting - 0800 GMT. MUMBAI - Reserve Bank of India holds monetary policy meeting.
